name: Super Man Or Monster
description: Super Man Or Monster is an explosive monsterfilled action game. Protect or destroy the world, as MAN or MONSTER! Build your army, jetpack around, blast monsters and kick ass. OR... bring the chaos as you bash, stomp and wreck cities. Your choice!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or ATI 7950 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
